sqlMap.insert:
SELECT BIFS_BUSINESS_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS bussId FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BIFS_BUSINESS ( BUSS_ID, BUSS_TYPE, APPLY_ID, BUSS_NO, NATURE, CLTNO, LSH, CUR_CODE, CUR_CODE_LINK, AMOUNT, BALANCE, ACCOUNT_NO, RATE, ACT_DATE, START_DATE, END_DATE, WATCH_DATE, INTEREST_DAY, INTEREST_BASE, ADV_FLAG, ADJUST_DAY, MEMO, APPLY_DATE, FINANCE_NAME, FINANCE_NO, EXPECT_DAY, EXPECT_RATE, STAND_RATE, ADD_POINT, FLOAT_RATE, BOND_NAME, BOND_NO, BOND_NUM, INTEREST_PERIOD, REPAY_TYPE, LIBRO_REFE, LIBRO_MAX, LIBRO_MIN, RATE_LINK, P_BUSS_ID, REJECT_REASON, REASON, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, AMOUNTLOCAL, LINK_RATE, PAR_VALUE, DEPOSIT_AMOUNT, FINISH_TYPE, STATE ) VALUES( #bussId#, #bussType#, #applyId#, #bussNo#, #nature#, #cltno#, #lsh#, #curCode#, #curCodeLink#, #amount#, #balance#, #accountNo#, #rate#, #actDate#, #startDate#, #endDate#, #watchDate#, #interestDay#, #interestBase#, #advFlag#, #adjustDay#, #memo#, #applyDate#, #financeName#, #financeNo#, #expectDay#, #expectRate#, #standRate#, #addPoint#, #floatRate#, #bondName#, #bondNo#, #bondNum#, #interestPeriod#, #repayType#, #libroRefe#, #libroMax#, #libroMin#, #rateLink#, #pBussId#, #rejectReason#, #reason#, #creator#, #createTime#, #amountlocal#, #linkRate#, #parValue#, #depositAmount#, #finishType#, #state# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BIFS_BUSINESS SET BUSS_ID = #bussId#
BUSS_TYPE = #bussType#
APPLY_ID = #applyId#
BUSS_NO = #bussNo#
NATURE = #nature#
CLTNO = #cltno#
LSH = #lsh#
CUR_CODE = #curCode#
CUR_CODE_LINK = #curCodeLink#
AMOUNT = #amount#
BALANCE = #balance#
ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo#
RATE = #rate#
ACT_DATE = #actDate#
START_DATE = #startDate#
END_DATE = #endDate#
WATCH_DATE = #watchDate#
INTEREST_DAY = #interestDay#
INTEREST_BASE = #interestBase#
ADV_FLAG = #advFlag#
ADJUST_DAY = #adjustDay#
MEMO = #memo#
APPLY_DATE = #applyDate#
FINANCE_NAME = #financeName#
FINANCE_NO = #financeNo#
EXPECT_DAY = #expectDay#
EXPECT_RATE = #expectRate#
STAND_RATE = #standRate#
ADD_POINT = #addPoint#
FLOAT_RATE = #floatRate#
BOND_NAME = #bondName#
BOND_NO = #bondNo#
BOND_NUM = #bondNum#
INTEREST_PERIOD = #interestPeriod#
REPAY_TYPE = #repayType#
LIBRO_REFE = #libroRefe#
LIBRO_MAX = #libroMax#
LIBRO_MIN = #libroMin#
RATE_LINK = #rateLink#
P_BUSS_ID = #pBussId#
REJECT_REASON = #rejectReason#
REASON = #reason#
CREATOR = #creator#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime#
AMOUNTLOCAL = #amountlocal#
LINK_RATE = #linkRate#
PAR_VALUE = #parValue#
DEPOSIT_AMOUNT = #depositAmount#
FINISH_TYPE = #finishType#
STATE = #state#
WHERE BUSS_ID = #bussId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.BUSS_ID AS "bussId", T.BUSS_TYPE AS "bussType", T.APPLY_ID AS "applyId", T.BUSS_NO AS "bussNo", T.NATURE AS "nature", T.CLTNO AS "cltno", T.LSH AS "lsh", T.CUR_CODE AS "curCode", T.CUR_CODE_LINK AS "curCodeLink", T.AMOUNT AS "amount", T.BALANCE AS "balance", T.ACCOUNT_NO AS "accountNo", T.RATE AS "rate", T.ACT_DATE AS "actDate", T.START_DATE AS "startDate", T.END_DATE AS "endDate", T.WATCH_DATE AS "watchDate", T.INTEREST_DAY AS "interestDay", T.INTEREST_BASE AS "interestBase", T.ADV_FLAG AS "advFlag", T.ADJUST_DAY AS "adjustDay", T.MEMO AS "memo", T.APPLY_DATE AS "applyDate", T.FINANCE_NAME AS "financeName", T.FINANCE_NO AS "financeNo", T.EXPECT_DAY AS "expectDay", T.EXPECT_RATE AS "expectRate", T.STAND_RATE AS "standRate", T.ADD_POINT AS "addPoint", T.FLOAT_RATE AS "floatRate", T.BOND_NAME AS "bondName", T.BOND_NO AS "bondNo", T.BOND_NUM AS "bondNum", T.INTEREST_PERIOD AS "interestPeriod", T.REPAY_TYPE AS "repayType", T.LIBRO_REFE AS "libroRefe", T.LIBRO_MAX AS "libroMax", T.LIBRO_MIN AS "libroMin", T.RATE_LINK AS "rateLink", T.P_BUSS_ID AS "pBussId", T.REJECT_REASON AS "rejectReason", T.REASON AS "reason", T.CREATOR AS "creator", T.CREATE_TIME AS "createTime", T.AMOUNTLOCAL AS "amountlocal", T.LINK_RATE AS "linkRate", T.PAR_VALUE AS "parValue", T.DEPOSIT_AMOUNT AS "depositAmount", T.FINISH_TYPE AS "finishType", T.STATE AS "state" FROM BIFS_BUSINESS T WHERE 1 = 1
T.BUSS_ID = #bussId#
T.BUSS_TYPE = #bussType#
T.APPLY_ID = #applyId#
T.BUSS_NO = #bussNo#
T.NATURE = #nature#
T.CLTNO = #cltno#
T.LSH = #lsh#
T.CUR_CODE = #curCode#
T.CUR_CODE_LINK = #curCodeLink#
T.AMOUNT = #amount#
T.BALANCE = #balance#
T.ACCOUNT_NO = #accountNo#
T.RATE = #rate#
T.ACT_DATE = #actDate#
T.START_DATE = #startDate#
T.END_DATE = #endDate#
T.WATCH_DATE = #watchDate#
T.INTEREST_DAY = #interestDay#
T.INTEREST_BASE = #interestBase#
T.ADV_FLAG = #advFlag#
T.ADJUST_DAY = #adjustDay#
T.MEMO = #memo#
T.APPLY_DATE = #applyDate#
T.FINANCE_NAME = #financeName#
T.FINANCE_NO = #financeNo#
T.EXPECT_DAY = #expectDay#
T.EXPECT_RATE = #expectRate#
T.STAND_RATE = #standRate#
T.ADD_POINT = #addPoint#
T.FLOAT_RATE = #floatRate#
T.BOND_NAME = #bondName#
T.BOND_NO = #bondNo#
T.BOND_NUM = #bondNum#
T.INTEREST_PERIOD = #interestPeriod#
T.REPAY_TYPE = #repayType#
T.LIBRO_REFE = #libroRefe#
T.LIBRO_MAX = #libroMax#
T.LIBRO_MIN = #libroMin#
T.RATE_LINK = #rateLink#
T.P_BUSS_ID = #pBussId#
T.REJECT_REASON = #rejectReason#
T.REASON = #reason#
T.CREATOR = #creator#
T.CREATE_TIME = #createTime#
T.AMOUNTLOCAL = #amountlocal#
T.LINK_RATE = #linkRate#
T.PAR_VALUE = #parValue#
T.DEPOSIT_AMOUNT = #depositAmount#
T.FINISH_TYPE = #finishType#
T.STATE = #state#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT BIFS_BUSINESS_LOG_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS logId FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BIFS_BUSINESS_LOG ( LOG_ID, BUSS_ID, LOG_TYPE, FMID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, MEMO ) VALUES( #logId#, #bussId#, #logType#, #fmid#, #creator#, #createTime#, #memo# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BIFS_BUSINESS_LOG SET LOG_ID = #logId#
BUSS_ID = #bussId#
LOG_TYPE = #logType#
FMID = #fmid#
CREATOR = #creator#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime#
MEMO = #memo#
WHERE LOG_ID = #logId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.LOG_ID AS "logId", T.BUSS_ID AS "bussId", T.LOG_TYPE AS "logType", T.FMID AS "fmid", T.CREATOR AS "creator", T.CREATE_TIME AS "createTime", T.MEMO AS "memo" FROM BIFS_BUSINESS_LOG T WHERE 1 = 1
T.LOG_ID = #logId#
T.BUSS_ID = #bussId#
T.LOG_TYPE = #logType#
T.FMID = #fmid#
T.CREATOR = #creator#
T.CREATE_TIME = #createTime#
T.MEMO = #memo#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT BIFS_NATURE_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS id FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BIFS_NATURE ( ID, BUSS_TYPE, NATURE_NAME, NATURE_VALUE ) VALUES( #id#, #bussType#, #natureName#, #natureValue# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BIFS_NATURE SET ID = #id#
BUSS_TYPE = #bussType#
NATURE_NAME = #natureName#
NATURE_VALUE = #natureValue#
WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.ID AS "id", T.BUSS_TYPE AS "bussType", T.NATURE_NAME AS "natureName", T.NATURE_VALUE AS "natureValue" FROM BIFS_NATURE T WHERE 1 = 1
T.ID = #id#
T.BUSS_TYPE = #bussType#
T.NATURE_NAME = #natureName#
T.NATURE_VALUE = #natureValue#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT TPS_AFFAIR_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS id FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TPS_AFFAIR ( ID, AFFAIR_CODE, CLTNO, ACT_DATE, DESCRPTION, UPFILENAME, STATUS, APPROVE_PERSON, APPROVE_TIME, BIZCASEID, CREATE_PERSON, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_PERSON, UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES( #id#, #affairCode#, #cltno#, #actDate#, #descrption#, #upfilename#, #status#, #approvePerson#, #approveTime#, #bizcaseid#, #createPerson#, #createTime#, #updatePerson#, #updateTime# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TPS_AFFAIR SET ID = #id#
AFFAIR_CODE = #affairCode#
CLTNO = #cltno#
ACT_DATE = #actDate#
DESCRPTION = #descrption#
UPFILENAME = #upfilename#
STATUS = #status#
APPROVE_PERSON = #approvePerson#
APPROVE_TIME = #approveTime#
BIZCASEID = #bizcaseid#
CREATE_PERSON = #createPerson#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime#
UPDATE_PERSON = #updatePerson#
UPDATE_TIME = #updateTime#
WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.ID AS "id", T.AFFAIR_CODE AS "affairCode", T.CLTNO AS "cltno", T.ACT_DATE AS "actDate", T.DESCRPTION AS "descrption", T.UPFILENAME AS "upfilename", T.STATUS AS "status", T.APPROVE_PERSON AS "approvePerson", T.APPROVE_TIME AS "approveTime", T.BIZCASEID AS "bizcaseid", T.CREATE_PERSON AS "createPerson", T.CREATE_TIME AS "createTime", T.UPDATE_PERSON AS "updatePerson", T.UPDATE_TIME AS "updateTime" FROM TPS_AFFAIR T WHERE 1 = 1
T.ID = #id#
T.AFFAIR_CODE = #affairCode#
T.CLTNO = #cltno#
T.ACT_DATE = #actDate#
T.DESCRPTION = #descrption#
T.UPFILENAME = #upfilename#
T.STATUS = #status#
T.APPROVE_PERSON = #approvePerson#
T.APPROVE_TIME = #approveTime#
T.BIZCASEID = #bizcaseid#
T.CREATE_PERSON = #createPerson#
T.CREATE_TIME = #createTime#
T.UPDATE_PERSON = #updatePerson#
T.UPDATE_TIME = #updateTime#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TPS_AFFAIR_TYPE ( AFFAIR_CODE, AFFAIR_NAME, DESCRIPTION, CREATE_PERSON, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_PERSON, UPDATE_TIME, OPEN_STATE ) VALUES( #affairCode#, #affairName#, #description#, #createPerson#, #createTime#, #updatePerson#, #updateTime#, #openState# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TPS_AFFAIR_TYPE SET AFFAIR_CODE = #affairCode#
AFFAIR_NAME = #affairName#
DESCRIPTION = #description#
CREATE_PERSON = #createPerson#
CREATE_TIME = #createTime#
UPDATE_PERSON = #updatePerson#
UPDATE_TIME = #updateTime#
OPEN_STATE = #openState#
WHERE AFFAIR_CODE = #affairCode#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.AFFAIR_CODE AS "affairCode", T.AFFAIR_NAME AS "affairName", T.DESCRIPTION AS "description", T.CREATE_PERSON AS "createPerson", T.CREATE_TIME AS "createTime", T.UPDATE_PERSON AS "updatePerson", T.UPDATE_TIME AS "updateTime", T.OPEN_STATE AS "openState" FROM TPS_AFFAIR_TYPE T WHERE 1 = 1
T.AFFAIR_CODE = #affairCode#
T.AFFAIR_NAME = #affairName#
T.DESCRIPTION = #description#
T.CREATE_PERSON = #createPerson#
T.CREATE_TIME = #createTime#
T.UPDATE_PERSON = #updatePerson#
T.UPDATE_TIME = #updateTime#
T.OPEN_STATE = #openState#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT BMM_WAREHOUSE_BILL_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS wbid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BMM_WAREHOUSE_BILL ( WBID, WHID, BLID, BEGINDATE, ENDDATE, LOCKED, ENDFLAG, ENDTYPE, REGISTERFLAG, REGISTERDATE, REGISTERAMOUNT, REGISTERTYPE, PRIORHOLDER, HOLDER, RECFLAG, BANENDRSMTMK, BILLSTATUS, HOLDERBANKNO, HOLDERBANKACCOUNT, OWNERBANKNO, OWNERBANKACCOUNT, PAYBILLWAY, SOURCEAPPNO, SOURCEID, BANKBILLSYSNO, LASTTXID, PROCESSFLAG, REMARK, CREATETIME, LASTUPDATETIME, FLAWFLAG, SETTLEDAMOUNT, DISCOUNTREGRATE, DAYSINWAY, DEFERDAYS, ORGWHID ) VALUES( #wbid#, #whid#, #blid#, #begindate#, #enddate#, #locked#, #endflag#, #endtype#, #registerflag#, #registerdate#, #registeramount#, #registertype#, #priorholder#, #holder#, #recflag#, #banendrsmtmk#, #billstatus#, #holderbankno#, #holderbankaccount#, #ownerbankno#, #ownerbankaccount#, #paybillway#, #sourceappno#, #sourceid#, #bankbillsysno#, #lasttxid#, #processflag#, #remark#, #createtime#, #lastupdatetime#, #flawflag#, #settledamount#, #discountregrate#, #daysinway#, #deferdays#, #orgwhid# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE BMM_WAREHOUSE_BILL SET WBID = #wbid#
WHID = #whid#
BLID = #blid#
BEGINDATE = #begindate#
ENDDATE = #enddate#
LOCKED = #locked#
ENDFLAG = #endflag#
ENDTYPE = #endtype#
REGISTERFLAG = #registerflag#
REGISTERDATE = #registerdate#
REGISTERAMOUNT = #registeramount#
REGISTERTYPE = #registertype#
PRIORHOLDER = #priorholder#
HOLDER = #holder#

BANENDRSMTMK = #banendrsmtmk#
BILLSTATUS = #billstatus#
HOLDERBANKNO = #holderbankno#
HOLDERBANKACCOUNT = #holderbankaccount#
OWNERBANKNO = #ownerbankno#
OWNERBANKACCOUNT = #ownerbankaccount#
PAYBILLWAY = #paybillway#
SOURCEAPPNO = #sourceappno#
SOURCEID = #sourceid#
BANKBILLSYSNO = #bankbillsysno#
LASTTXID = #lasttxid#
PROCESSFLAG = #processflag#
REMARK = #remark#
CREATETIME = #createtime#
LASTUPDATETIME = #lastupdatetime#
FLAWFLAG = #flawflag#
SETTLEDAMOUNT = #settledamount#
DISCOUNTREGRATE = #discountregrate#
DAYSINWAY = #daysinway#
DEFERDAYS = #deferdays#
ORGWHID = #orgwhid#
WHERE WBID = #wbid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.WBID AS "wbid", T.WHID AS "whid", T.BLID AS "blid", T.BEGINDATE AS "begindate", T.ENDDATE AS "enddate", T.LOCKED AS "locked", T.ENDFLAG AS "endflag", T.ENDTYPE AS "endtype", T.REGISTERFLAG AS "registerflag", T.REGISTERDATE AS "registerdate", T.REGISTERAMOUNT AS "registeramount", T.REGISTERTYPE AS "registertype", T.PRIORHOLDER AS "priorholder", T.HOLDER AS "holder", T.RECFLAG AS "recflag", T.BANENDRSMTMK AS "banendrsmtmk", T.BILLSTATUS AS "billstatus", T.HOLDERBANKNO AS "holderbankno", T.HOLDERBANKACCOUNT AS "holderbankaccount", T.OWNERBANKNO AS "ownerbankno", T.OWNERBANKACCOUNT AS "ownerbankaccount", T.PAYBILLWAY AS "paybillway", T.SOURCEAPPNO AS "sourceappno", T.SOURCEID AS "sourceid", T.BANKBILLSYSNO AS "bankbillsysno", T.LASTTXID AS "lasttxid", T.PROCESSFLAG AS "processflag", T.REMARK AS "remark", T.CREATETIME AS "createtime", T.LASTUPDATETIME AS "lastupdatetime", T.FLAWFLAG AS "flawflag", T.SETTLEDAMOUNT AS "settledamount", T.DISCOUNTREGRATE AS "discountregrate", T.DAYSINWAY AS "daysinway", T.DEFERDAYS AS "deferdays", T.ORGWHID AS "orgwhid" FROM BMM_WAREHOUSE_BILL T WHERE 1 = 1
T.WBID = #wbid#
T.WHID = #whid#
T.BLID = #blid#
T.BEGINDATE = #begindate#
T.ENDDATE = #enddate#
T.LOCKED = #locked#
T.ENDFLAG = #endflag#
T.ENDTYPE = #endtype#
T.REGISTERFLAG = #registerflag#
T.REGISTERDATE = #registerdate#
T.REGISTERAMOUNT = #registeramount#
T.REGISTERTYPE = #registertype#
T.PRIORHOLDER = #priorholder#
T.HOLDER = #holder#
T.RECFLAG = #recflag#
T.BANENDRSMTMK = #banendrsmtmk#
T.BILLSTATUS = #billstatus#
T.HOLDERBANKNO = #holderbankno#
T.HOLDERBANKACCOUNT = #holderbankaccount#
T.OWNERBANKNO = #ownerbankno#
T.OWNERBANKACCOUNT = #ownerbankaccount#
T.PAYBILLWAY = #paybillway#

sqlMap.insert:
SELECT CTMS_BLEND_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS id FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CTMS_BLEND ( ID, NO, USER_ID, OPERATE_TIME ) VALUES( #id#, #no#, #userId#, #operateTime# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE CTMS_BLEND SET ID = #id#
NO = #no#
USER_ID = #userId#
OPERATE_TIME = #operateTime#
WHERE ID = #id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T.ID AS "id", T.NO AS "no", T.USER_ID AS "userId", T.OPERATE_TIME AS "operateTime" FROM CTMS_BLEND T WHERE 1 = 1
T.ID = #id#
T.NO = #no#
T.USER_ID = #userId#
T.OPERATE_TIME = #operateTime#
